transcript: and losing a third of his men as strag- glers by the way, Bagration came out on the Vienna-Znaim road at Hollabriinn a few hours ahead of the French who were approaching Hollabriinn from Vienna. Kutiizov with his transport had still to march for some days be- fore he could reach Znaim. Hence Bagrati6n with his four thousand hungry, exhausted men would have to detain for days the whole enemy army that came upon him at Hollabriinn, which was clearly impossible.
